Package task1

Class MetroStationWithArray

java.lang.Object
task1.AbstractMetroStation
task1.MetroStationWithArray
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetroStationWithSorting
public class MetroStationWithArray extends AbstractMetroStation
Represents metro station data with an array of operating hours. This class is inherited from the abstract AbstractMetroStation class.

  • Constructor Summary

    The constructor initialises the metro station object with the specified values with name, opened year and operating hours.
